text: Nekotoryye araby - neveruyushchiye - govorili, chto yakoby Milostivyy vzyal sebe rebonka, izmyshlyaya lozhno, chto angely - docheri Allakha. Allakh - khvala Yemu! - prevyshe togo, o chom oni lozhno govoryat. Ved' angely - pochitayemyye raby, blizkiye k Nemu, poklonyayutsya tol'ko Yemu Yedinomu
